categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Wendy Leech (born November 30, 1949) is a stuntwoman who was C-3PO's stunt double in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and Return Of The Jedi. She is the daughter of late stuntman George Leech and spouse of stunt coordinator/performer Vic Armstrong. She has worked on George Lucas and Steven Spielberg's Indiana Jones franchise as well as select James Bond 007 films with her husband Armstrong, often doubling female leading stars.
